replies.bodyText:
@danielezonca
I'm expecting not - those are the "default" Expressions. Extensions will be managed in future
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.author: gitgabrio

timeline.bodyText:
see #2962 (comment)
Those are additional assertions - IMHO it does not make much sense to move them on a different test to only have the same computation made twice but verified with different assertions. BTW it is the way we have managed such situations until now
timeline.author: gitgabrio
gitgabrio
gitgabrio

timeline.bodyText:
see #2962 (comment)
In general, this map is populated in different methods. For this specific case, the map has to be returned by that method
timeline.author: gitgabrio

replies.bodyText: I'm still not sure, I do not expect a factory method just to populated one of the input. What about rename factory as populate / init / fill?
replies.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText:
see #2962 (comment)
In the generated code there is a reference to that parameter. That reference must always be "param1".
timeline.author: gitgabrio
gitgabrio
